Greetings to Chairman of Mauritanian Military Council
articles.content:
Greetings to Chairman of Mauritanian Military Council 
   Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Ely Ould Mohamed Vall, chairman of the Mauritanian Military Council for Justice and Democracy, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the independence of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished the friendly Mauritanian people progress and prosperity.

DPRK SPA Chairman Meets Member of European Parliament
articles.content:
DPRK SPA Chairman Meets Member of European Parliament
   Pyongyang, November 27 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Glyn Ford, member of the European Parliament from the British Labour Party, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
